title: EXPENSIVE MISTAKE OR WARRANTY CLAIM? $3400 TRACTOR REPAIR

tasks.task: Determine the issue a customer encountered with their 2021 John Deere 3E series tractor.
subtasks: Identify the problem: top link ear on the three-point hitch broken during backing up.
Assess whether the damage is under the bumper-to-bumper warranty.
Discuss the possibility of the incident being misuse vs. manufacturing defect.
Calculate the cost to replace the top housing and suggest an alternative repair method (welding).
Provide a product recommendation for tractor safety (RimGuard).

tasks.task: Address potential causes of top link damage.
subtasks: Mention examples of attachments that could cause damage (e.g., snowblowers, stump grinders).
Discuss the importance of understanding tractor warranty coverage and proper attachment use.

tasks.task: Promote Good Works Tractors' services and products.
subtasks: Encourage subscription and support through product donations.
Highlight the website (GoodWorksTractors.com) for purchasing tractor attachments.
